Chinese.name: Ckafka 数据备份到COS schedule
Chinese.description: 本示例会获取Ckafka 的分区数，并根据分区并发调用consumer函数。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要传递相关函数的环境变量,本实例由两个函数组成。

English.name: CkafkaBackupToCOSSchedule
English.description: This example will get the Ckafka partition ids, and run the consumer function.
English.attention: When using this sample code, you need to pass the environment variables of related functions. This example consists of two functions.
